## SubscribeQueueDecoratorOptions interface

Options for subscribe queue decorator

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SubscribeQueueDecoratorOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [additionalData](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.additionaldata.md) | Object | Additional data that is possible to send to subscribe options, can be used in custom middlewares |
|  [completeCode](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.completecode.md) | string | Code that indicates that no more messages are coming from queue |
|  [producesType](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.producestype.md) | ResponseType | Type that is produced by this queue |
|  [queueName](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.queuename.md) | string | Name of queue to be subscribed to, if not specified it equals to name |
|  [responseTransform](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.responsetransform.md) | string | Name of function used as response transform |
|  [singleResponse](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.singleresponse.md) | boolean | Indication whether automatically complete observable after single response from web socket |
|  [statusQueue](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.statusqueue.md) | boolean | Indication whether is this queue used as status queue |
|  [statusQueueMapping](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeuedecoratoroptions.statusqueuemapping.md) | (response: any) =&gt; [StatusQueueResponse](./rest-stompjs.statusqueueresponse.md) | Function used for mapping of status queue result to known status queue |
